text: Welcome to module 5 where we will be looking at the market participants of the entire ecosystem of trading with algorithms and high frequency trading included in this because it's so critically important as a discretionary intraday trader to really know what the entire market landscape is made of or the entire market ecosystem and really the reason why a lot of these order flow patterns exist is because of all the various different that are employed by these various market participants, and especially over the last five, six, seven years since the rise of the machine in the form of these HFT systems and algorithms that really dominate 70% of the liquidity of the market and what we trade in the future space, that it is so important to understand. who you're up against and what execution strategies you're up against in order to make your best informed decision to profit from these plays.
transcript: Welcome to module 5 where we will be looking at the market participants of the entire ecosystem of trading with algorithms and high frequency trading included in this because it's so critically important as a discretionary intraday trader to really know what the entire market landscape is made of or the entire market ecosystem and really the reason why a lot of these order flow patterns exist is because of all the various different that are employed by these various market participants, and especially over the last five, six, seven years since the rise of the machine in the form of these HFT systems and algorithms that really dominate 70% of the liquidity of the market and what we trade in the future space, that it is so important to understand. who you're up against and what execution strategies you're up against in order to make your best informed decision to profit from these plays.
